EmailTemplate.subject: Doctor Evidence-Post-training survey
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
*|Doctor Evidence Post-Training Survey|*
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thanks for participating in the Doctor Evidence Introductory Training today. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you in future trainings. Below is a link to a 5-question survey which will help us address your needs going forward.
https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/DZCHMQD
Looking forward to hearing from you!
Toby Sayre Vice President, Consulting Services Doctor Evidence
